abstract: Google says that YouTube, which it bought three years ago, will eventually reach profitability. The San Francisco Chronicle looks at what steps Google is taking to get there.
snippet: Google says that YouTube, which it bought three years ago, will eventually reach profitability. The San Francisco Chronicle looks at what steps Google is taking to get there.
lead_paragraph: Three years after agreeing to buy YouTube in a $1.65 billion stock deal, Google is getting asked one question increasingly often: When will the video-sharing site turn a profit?
